price: Dan ingatlah apa yang dibacakan di rumahmu dari ayat-ayat Allah dan hikmah (sunah nabimu). Sesungguhnya Allah adalah Maha Lembut lagi Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur'na mā yut'lā fī buyūtikunna min āyāti al-lahi wal-ḥik'mati inna al-laha kāna laṭīfan khabīran
